CustomField.description: US-0009260 - [Ads 2020] OLI Trigger to QLI/AP, Fields & Syncing
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Billing_Category__c ,"CPM"), SalesPriceNet__c + Targeting_Fee2__c , SalesPriceNet__c)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Sales Price plus any targeting or surcharge
CustomField.label: Sales Price Gross
